explosives.rationale: There are no chemical groups associated with explosive properties present in the molecules.

self_reactive_substances.rationale: There are no chemical groups associated with explosive or self-reactive properties present in the molecule.

substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.hazard_name: Substances and mixtures, which in contact with water, emit flammable gases
substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.rationale: The chemical structure of the substance does not contain metals or metaloids(B, Si, P, Ge, As, Se, Sn, Sb, Te, Bi, Po, At).

corrosive_to_metals.rationale: Test methods applicable to solid substances are not available (Melting point: 236degC)

acute_toxicity_oral.rationale: In two tests with rats, we compared the LD50 values for male and female rats. Then for the lower of these groups we compared the LD50 values between the two tests, and selected the lower of the two. Based on the value LD50 = 450.0 mg/kg (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data) which was the lower value of the data from the two tests, the substance was classified as Category 4.

acute_toxicity_dermal.rationale: It was set as the outside of Category based on rat LD50 >5000mg (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data).

acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.rationale: It was set as Category 5 based on rat LC0 = 3.05mg/L and LC10-20 = 5.2mg/L (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data).

skin_corrosion_irritation.rationale: Skin reactions against rabbits is only slight erythema with non-scraping part and scratch part, and a stimulative reaction has a statement that it disappeared within 72 hours. It was set as category 3 since weak skin irritations was admitted also in skin sensitivity test (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data).

serious_eye_damage_irritation.rationale: Based on the description that the redness in the conjunctiva and dropsy were observed slightly to the rabbit eye, and recovered within four days (EU Agricultural Chemical Registration Data), it was classified into Category 2B.

respiratory_skin_sensitizer.classification: Respiratory sensitization: Classification not possible; Skin sensitization: Not classified
respiratory_skin_sensitizer.rationale: Respiratory sensitization: no data available. Skin sensitization: skin sensitization was carried out the outside of Category by the maximization method using a guinea pig based on the description (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data) that it is negative.

germ_cell_mutagenicity.rationale: There is no data of human multi generation epidemiology, an multi generation mutagenicity test, and a germ cell in vivo mutagenicity test, and there is the description it is negative in the somatic cell test in vivo mutagenicity test (small core test using mouse) (EU Agricultural Chemical Registration Data). So it is classified as the out of the Category.

carcinogenicity.rationale: In carcinogenicity tests in rat and mouse, based on the description that generating of treatment-related increased tumor was not observed in each examination (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data), it was out of the Category.

toxic_to_reproduction.rationale: Although gigantocellularis were acknowledged by the testis of F3 male child in the three-generation reproduction study using a rat, it seems that there is no relation with administrations. Both parent and fetal animals did not have the other effects of this. In the teratogenic study using rats and rabbits, teratogenic was not acknowledged by highest dose as which general toxicity is regarded by parent animals (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data). Based on the above information, it was carried out the outside of Category.

systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organs/systemic toxicity following single exposure
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_statement: May cause damage to organs (systemic toxicity, nervous system)
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.rationale: It was considered as Category 2 (systemicity, nervous system) based on the description (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data) that creeping, eye haemorrhages, spasms, collapse, diarrhea, tremors, conrtraction, salivation, and bloody tears etc., at dose (450-1012mg/kg) within the range of guidance value in Category 2 in rats and mouse were observed.

systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organs/systemic toxicity following repeated exposure
systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.rationale: Because of the description of few toxic effects with dosage higher than the guidance value range of Category 2 in the subacute toxicity study with rats during 90 days, and of the mention of no toxic effect with dosage in the chronic toxicity study with rats for two years (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data), it was judged out of Categories.

acute_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: It was classified into Category 3 from 48-hour EC50=51.1mg/L of Crustacea (Daphnia magna) (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data, 2005).

chronic_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: Based on NOEC=5 mg/L during 21 days of the shellfish (Daphnia magna) (IUCLID, 2000), though acute toxicity was Category 3.
